data.eml:eml: Palaearctic Hoplitis bees of the subgenera Chlidoplitis and Megahoplitis (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Müller, Andreas (2014): Palaearctic Hoplitis bees of the subgenera Chlidoplitis and Megahoplitis (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species. Zootaxa 3765 (2): 161-174, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3765.2.4
